about_the_game:
Welcome seeker. Please, take a look at this new take of a vampire story and tell us if it piques your interest.



What is Vampirii? A Ren'Py-based, choice-driven visual novel that features non-linear game play with the possibility to be played indefinitely. The features include

  • Vampire feeding choices.
  • Areas that you can visit multiple times.
  • Leveling and perks.
  • Quest chains, presented in a realistic, believable fashion.
  • A new kind of a threat to vampires, necessitating novel solutions.
  • Several player lairs (only the first one is available in the Demo).
  • Combat encounters (unlimited supply). The full game will include much greater variety and unpredictability.
  • Left for dead system, depending on the time at night and enemy.
  • Ability to beat the game without doing the "Main Quest." This, of course is planned for the full game.
  • Access to transportation, resulting to additional areas and (in the full game).
  • Multiple endings. The Demo lets you play indefinitely. The full game will have some endings that are "final" and some that let you play indefinitely.
  • Alternative ways to reach certain story milestones.
  • Not all choices are made equal. Some offer much easier gaming experience than others.

What is the main premise? Presenting vampirism in a new way, introducing new elements while keeping certain key concepts intact.

Immerse in a realistic gameplay loop. If you ask yourself "What would it be if I really woke up as a vampire?", then this game is for you. Manage blood levels, pay attention to the time of night, address the wear and tear of your clothes, and try to raise money for those hard-to-get things, while not making it too oppressive to be fun.

What does this Demo include? The Demo contains the raw version of what would be Act 1. It is better to look at it as a "free Early Access" to the first part of the game. There may be parts that still need polishing and there is no music.



The Demo introduces some but not all of the key mechanics of the game. The combat system is stat and dice based and may be modifier or changed at later stages of development.


Each night you have a number of limited actions. Choose what you do before it is time to hide from the Sun.

  • Should you look for necks to bite?
  • Roam houses?
  • Explore new areas?
  • Do a quest?

content_descriptors.notes: Text description of vampire and monster feeding, including killing. Implied sex. No visual presentation of same. Occasional revealing outfits as in "bare neck and shoulders."

short_description: Prowl homes, explore neighborhoods, overcome random encounters and reveal dark secrets during Act 1 as a newly-risen vampire in this text-heavy visual novel. This Demo offers a glimpse into a novel vampire-themed game worlds in which one night you are the predator, another - the prey.
